title: Delete a Service Level Target definition record
content:
A change in circumstances or a change to the Service Level Agreement can cause an existing Service Level Target definition record to become obsolete or inactive. You can't delete a generated Service Level Target definition record, but you can disable it if you delete the target duration value.

For information on the automatically created Service Level Target definitions, see How to create a Service Level Target set record.
